Package Pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
Pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class Piece serving as a blueprint for the specific pieces of the chess.
Author:
Archil Shah, Mohamad Sherif

    • move

      public abstract boolean move​(Board b, int endFile, int endRank, java.lang.String promotion)
      Moves the current piece to the specified location on the board
      Parameters:
      b - represents the chess board object
      endFile - represents the final File for the piece
      endRank - represents the final Rank for the piece
      promotion - tells promoting piece for the Pawn
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid

    • isValid

      public abstract boolean isValid​(Board b, int endFile, int endRank)
      Checks if the move is valid before executing the move
      Parameters:
      b - represents the chess board object
      endFile - represents the final File for the piece
      endRank - represents the final Rank for the piece
      Returns:
      if the move is valid or not
